org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.util.date
Class EraCalc

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.util.date.EraCalc
Direct Known Subclasses:
GregorianEraCalc, JulianEraCalc
public abstract class EraCalc
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates era-specific calculations.

Author:
chad takahashi

          Determines the day of the week (Sun, Mon, Tue, etc.) from the specified date.
 int calcDayOfYear(int year, int month, int day)
           
 int calcWeekOfYear(int year, int month, int day)
          Determines the ISO week of the year (1-53) from the specified date.
abstract  double calcYearField(double timeInMs, DateFields dateFields)
          Calculates and sets DateFields.year based on timeInMs.
abstract  double calcYearTimestamp(int year)
          Calculates the timestamp corresponding to Jan-01 00h:00m:00s.0ms for the specified year.

          Returns a singleton EraCalc object capable of handling date calculations for the specified timestamp.

Field Detail

monthOffsetsInDays

protected int[] monthOffsetsInDays
Same as monthOffsetsInMs and monthOffsetsInMsLeapYear, except offset intervals are in days instead of milliseconds.

monthOffsetsInDaysLeapYear

protected int[] monthOffsetsInDaysLeapYear
Same as monthOffsetsInMs and monthOffsetsInMsLeapYear, except offset intervals are in days instead of milliseconds.

monthOffsetsInMs

protected double[] monthOffsetsInMs
Holds month offsets in milliseconds for every month in a non-leap year and leap year. [0] = # ms from Jan-01 at midnight to Jan-01 at midnight; [1] = # ms from Jan-01 at midnight to Feb-01 at midnight; ...

monthOffsetsInMsLeapYear

protected double[] monthOffsetsInMsLeapYear
Holds month offsets in milliseconds for every month in a non-leap year and leap year. [0] = # ms from Jan-01 at midnight to Jan-01 at midnight; [1] = # ms from Jan-01 at midnight to Feb-01 at midnight; ...

calcYearField

public abstract double calcYearField(double timeInMs,
                                     DateFields dateFields)
Calculates and sets DateFields.year based on timeInMs.

Returns:
the millisecond remainder of timeInMs from the beginning of the calculated year.

calcYearTimestamp

public abstract double calcYearTimestamp(int year)
Calculates the timestamp corresponding to Jan-01 00h:00m:00s.0ms for the specified year.

getDaysInMonth

public int getDaysInMonth(int month,
                          boolean isLeapYear)
Returns the number of days in the specified month, taking into account whether or not the month's associated year is a leap year.

getMaxYear

public abstract int getMaxYear()
Returns the largest year that this EraCalc is capable of handling.

isLeapYear

Returns true only if the specified year is a leap year.
